attributes.review: i thought this would be a good app to show love to our fake haired cheeto man but turns out it’s all a lie😾at the beginning it said “keep america great” and so i was like oH cOoL wErE gOnNa LeArN. instructions unclear, my cat is now hanging from the ceiling😪 aNd tHeN it was showing all the stuff cheeto man did for our country and i was sHocked to see almost nothing😳 poor cheeto man🥺

attributes.review: Upon discovery of this application, i couldnt wait to live my facist bootlicker dreams of supporting this racist homopjoboc white supremecist but the second i downloaded it it made my phone go haywire!!! Trump himself flew over my house in a helicopter and shot spitballs at my phone using a straw found in a wendys bathroom until eventually it caught on fire and exploded!!!! You owe me bunkerboy
attributes.title: Gotta buy a new phone because of bunkerboy

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I swear to GOD I got 4 different STD’s 🩸 by it. 😱 call me peaches 🍑 , idc, but I can just FEEL me getting sicker 🤨 by the day (and it’s not CORONA 🦠 because I haven’t had physical human interaction for THREE months!) I got tested for the STD’s 💊 though and I just got my results 🧬 back.  I swear right after I downloaded the app the symptoms started showing 😕. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🙅🏻‍♀️. vote Biden 2020 !
attributes.title: Terrible app 🧚🏼‍♀️👁👄👁😌🥰

attributes.review: this is the worst app that i have ever downloaded the first thing is did was show me a ✨stinky✨ ✨scary✨cheeto puff✨after i got over the pain and shock of such a scary thing it asked me for my phone number and i was like🧐 bc my parents always said stranger danger but i felt that me and our bunker not just had such a close personal relationship that i could trust him🥰 and then they sent me coordinates so that i could be kidnapped😡 i was just so disappointed in our president that i started to cry and knew that i couldn’t trust bunker boy anymore and i sent him a tide pod hoping that he remembers how good of a snake they are😘
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️✨no bunker boy🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.review:
Very poor instructions !! Message unclear.

I don’t understand how to make America Great “again”.  When was it great to begin with? When the black people were enslaved and the indigenous people were dying? That’s what it seems to be hinting at.

Personally, I believe America was best before the white man showed up. As a mixed kid, I would be very happy not being alive if that’s what it took.  :)
attributes.title: MAGA

attributes.review: i got this app to support our beloved President in all his endeavours, but as soon as i opened the app, a large blaring noise that sounded almost like a tornado siren came from my phone, and a message came onto the screen that read “⚠️YOU’VE BEEN TRUMPED, B*TCH”. the noise scared my future children and made my cat turn feral. if i could give this nightmare a 0/5, i would, DO NOT download this app 😤
attributes.title: absolutely appalling

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I’m a hardcore Trump Supporter and I wanted to be able to support the President in any means necessary... but as soon as I opened the app, common sense kicked in and I just felt disgusted. Also, not to mention how super buggy and annoying it is. My screen is now permanently glitched from seeing the annoying orange. Please PLEASE do not download this app!
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: Trump 2020🤩🥳 but in the zoo 🥰 He belongs in the zoo with the rest of his supporters ✨🧚🏻‍♀️ When I downloaded this app I got got possessed just by looking at his face he scared me so bad I thought it has an orange demon 😭his face has this ugly look that makes me gag every time I see him like he should be removed from this world because he is harming my eyes 😔 orange Cheeto has no rights to be in the same universe as me 🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: When i opens the app i got a random FaceTime call and when i answered it, the screen was black and i heard screaming. After begging to see what was happening, the screen showed Barron Trump, yes the president’s son, tied up with rope and there was cloth in this mouth. I saw a dark figure and the call ended. Not sure if this was a prank but it was seriously scary and i’m never opening the app again.
attributes.title: Cult 🙈👀🙀
